semantic_identifier: 64: feat: Segment detail: add inline editor for positioning templates with local state + validation

sections.text:
## Description

Implements the inline editing UI for segment positioning templates in the Segment Detail view.

Changes:
- Adds an edit/read toggle per positioning template section: Value Props, Differentiators, Proof Points, and Objections.
- Reuses the template payload/schema from GOLD-4 to render and edit the same shape the backend expects.
- Introduces local form state for each section with:
  - dirty tracking (per section and overall) to enable/disable actions and warn on navigation (if applicable in the app)
  - basic client-side validation (required + max length constraints) with inline error messaging
- Preserves server defaults when a segment has no custom template by initializing the editor from the resolved “effective template” (custom if present, otherwise server-provided defaults) and only tracking changes against the original effective values.
- No persistence is wired: save/apply actions update local UI state only (and can be hooked up to an API in a follow-up PR).

Implementation notes:
- Adds a small set of shared form utilities/components (section editor, text inputs/textarea, validation helpers) to keep section implementations consistent.
- Keeps the existing segment read experience unchanged when not in edit mode.
- Avoids backend/API changes; focuses purely on UI/UX and client-side state management (medium priority scope).

## How Has This Been Tested?

local
